result.title: Got tired of palindromes? Wait just a bit.
result.content:
Everybody thinks that there are too many palindromes. That's why I decided to collect all remaining problems and to announce the contest on Timus. I won't bother you with palindromic problems anymore :) The contest will be held on 11th of July at 13:00 YEKT.

A paper on palindromic tree was sent to conference. The previous publications had appeared only on codeforces and other forums. The paper can be found only here for now.
